feed.title: Dagu Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.14.1
entry.content:
Changelog

  • b1c961bdecb32b3eb44044061d97ce034512e0ff fix: action buttons on the DAG list page don't work for DAGs with custom names (#625)

What's Changed

  • fix: action buttons on the DAG list page don't work for DAGs with custom names by @rocwang in https://github.com/dagu-dev/dagu/pull/625
  • Structured logging by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-dev/dagu/pull/623
  • Fix installer script bug by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-dev/dagu/pull/624

New Contributors

  • @rocwang made their first contribution in https://github.com/dagu-dev/dagu/pull/625

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-dev/dagu/compare/v1.14.0...v1.14.1

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.14.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update actions/cache from v3 to v4 by @Kiyo510 in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/630
  • Remove container if workflow is cancelled by @x4204 in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/634
  • Fix toggling DAG suspension for DAGs with custom names by @rocwang in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/636
  • Improve the pattern of "schedule" in the JSON schema file by @rocwang in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/637
  • [#635] fix: Parameter does not work by @yohamta in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/641

Special Thanks

@zph @bbqi for addressing issue #635

Full Changelog: https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/compare/v1.14.1...v1.14.2

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.14.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: Update documents for executors by @yohamta in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/642
  • doc: Remove duplicate header by @yohamta in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/643
  • Update README.md by @yohamta in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/644
  • Update documentation for schema definition by @yohamta in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/645
  • Add license headers by @yohamta in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/646
  • Organize config pkg by @yohamta in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/647
  • Improve the test coverage by @yohamta in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/649
  • Update codecov config by @yohamta in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/650
  • Fix log not loading when '&' in name by @Lucaslah in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/651
  • ISSUE[584] ssh executor does not support login in password by @halalala222 in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/655
  • ISSUE[578] Add json bool configuration option to HTTP executor by @halalala222 in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/656
  • [ISSUE 657] Fix HTTP_HandleCancel in TestAgent_HandleHTTP was a flakey test by @Kiyo510 in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/658
  • [ISSUE 565] Implement Timeout Configuration for DAG Tasks by @Kiyo510 in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/660
  • [ISSUE 661] Add documentation about timeouts for DAG tasks by @Kiyo510 in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/662
  • [ISSUE#653] Add Pagination Parameters to DAG List API to limit the response by @halalala222 in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/664
  • Additional tests by @yohamta in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/663

New Contributors

  • @Lucaslah made their first contribution in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/651
  • @halalala222 made their first contribution in https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/pull/655

Full Changelog: https://github.com/daguflow/dagu/compare/v1.14.2...v1.14.3

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.14.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ISSUE #592] formatting of error text in web ui is not very noticeable by @halalala222 in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/670
  • ISSUE[581] Add Built-in Execution Context Variables by @halalala222 in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/654
  • Fixed build issue by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/672
  • [#675] fix: dashboard page fetch http 422 with DAG list API by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/680
  • [#674] Support env var in ssh config by @yohamta in https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/pull/683

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dagu-org/dagu/compare/v1.14.3...v1.14.4

entry.title: New release for Dagu: v1.14.5
entry.content:
Changelog
